entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
